title: Applied AI: Computer Vision and Optical Character Recognition (OCR)
description:
Computer vision is one the core areas of artificial intelligence and can empower your AI-enabled solution to ‘see’ the world and turning it in a readable/audible experience. In this session you’ll learn how to integrate the power of Azure computer vision service in a static web app and how to deploy/run it on the cloud. 

Chapters:
00:00 AI Show begins
00:14 Welcome Carlotta and Bethany
00:54 Computer Vision
02:41 Demo
10:00 Demo 2 - analyze image
14:07 How to get started
14:49 Learn more
